name: 12th International Conference on Epidemiology and Public Health 2023
content: All researchers, students, and epidemiology specialists are cordially invited to attend the upcoming epidemiology congress in order to participate in priceless scientific debates and advance current knowledge in the fields of epidemiology and public health. The "12th International Conference on Epidemiology & Public Health" is slated to take place during June 19â€“20, 2023, and Health Conferences will be inviting everyone to participate.
